name: Twizgrid
tag_list: photo, media, twitter, picture, visual, gallery, browser, search, mobile, ios
overview:
Twizgrid is a free image browser for Twitter that displays Twitter photos in a dynamic grid format. It’s a simple way to browse, discover and search for Twitter images, without even needing a Twitter account for most features.

Discover remarkable Twitter visual content by searching for keywords; view images shared by specific people; or simply browse the beautifully curated albums. While media remains the ultimate focus, the inclusion of corresponding tweets and Twitter profiles provide an invaluable frame of reference for the featured images.

The majority of Twizgrid’s features can be used without a Twitter account; however, for users who choose to log in, Twizgrid offers many additional functions of a Twitter client, allowing you to tweet, re-tweet, follow, favorite and more. Twizgrid is optimized for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad (including retina display), providing the most vivid gallery of Twitter photos.
